amendment.description: Page 8, after line 20, insert the following new subsection: (d) TECHNOLOGY NEUTRAL.--Nothing in this Act may be construed to require or prohibit the inclusion of a specific energy technology or technologies in the plan required by this section.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 116-42 to state that noting in this Act may be construed to require or prohibit the inclusion of a specific energy technology or technologies in the President's plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fletcher amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 305 - 121 (Roll no. 179).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mrs. Fletcher.
